1.name: The Birth of a Nation
1.description: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

2.name: Alice in Wonderland
2.description: Alice goes with her sister to a picnic and then she falls asleep and starts dreaming about a wonderland full of talking animals and walking playing cards.

3.name: The Cheat
3.description: A venal, spoiled stockbroker's wife impulsively embezzles $10,000 from the charity she chairs and desperately turns to a Burmese ivory trader to replace the stolen money.

4.name: Les vampires
4.description: An intrepid reporter and his loyal friend battle a bizarre secret society of criminals known as The Vampires.

5.name: Carmen
5.description: In order to help her smuggler kinsmen, a sultry gypsy seduces and corrupts an officer of the Civil Guard turning him into a traitor and murderer.

6.name: Der Golem
6.description: In this version of the golem legend, the golem, a clay statue brought to life by Rabbi Loew in 16th century Prague to save the Jews from the ongoing brutal persecution by the city's rulers,...                See full summary »

7.name: A Fool There Was
7.description: A married diplomat falls hopelessly under the spell of a predatory woman.

8.name: A Butterfly on the Wheel
8.description: Peggy Admaston and her husband are socialites whose happy marriage quickly deteriorates as Admaston neglects his young wife for business matters, and is unaware of her loneliness and ...                See full summary »

9.name: The Regeneration
9.description: A boy surrounded by violence grows up to become an infamous gangster.

10.name: Hypocrites
10.description: The parallel stories of a modern preacher and a medieval monk, Gabriel the Ascetic, who is killed by an ignorant mob for making a nude statue representing Truth, which is also represented by a ghostly naked girl who flits throughout the film.

11.name: Carmen
11.description: A Spanish soldier falls under the spell of a fiery gypsy girl named Carmen. His obsession with her leads to his ruin.

12.name: Posle smerti
12.description: Andrei lives a secluded life with his aunt, studying and thinking about his now-deceased mother. His friend Tsenin is concerned, and tries to get Andrei to accompany him to social events. ...                See full summary »

13.name: Hämnaren
13.description: A young student has had a relationship with a young Jewish woman. When she becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, arguing that she is Jewish and he Christian.

14.name: Far from the Madding Crowd
14.description: A girl farmer weds a faithless sergeant who is killed by her suitor, and realises she loves the bailiff.

15.name: The Italian
15.description: An immigrant leaves his sweetheart in Italy to find a better life across the sea in the grimy slums of New York. They are eventually reunited and marry. But life in New York is hard and ...                See full summary »

16.name: Civilization
16.description: Christ takes on the form of a pacifist count to end a senseless war.

17.name: Inspiration
17.description: A young sculptor searches for the perfect model to inspire his work.

18.name: Filibus
18.description: Skypirate Filibus commits robberies from her airship, while a dedicated detective attempts to put a stop to it.

20.name: Assunta Spina
20.description: Assunta Spina is a tragedy set in Naples at the beginning of the twentieth century. Assunta and Michele are in love but others come between them and there is much jealousy. They fight and ...                See full summary »

21.name: Four Feathers
21.description: The story opens at General Feversham's residence at the annual dinner that he gives to the ones who are left of the Crimea officers. At this dinner, Harry Feversham, the General's only son,...                See full summary »

22.name: Fanchon, the Cricket
22.description: A young wild girl Fanchon ( Mary Pickford ) lives in a forest with her eccentric grandmother who is suspected by the villagers of being a witch. The unkempt Fanchon suffers from her ...                See full summary »

23.name: Alias Jimmy Valentine
23.description: After robbing a bank, a criminal is wrongfully pardoned from prison.

24.name: Martyrs of the Alamo
24.description: The story of the defense of the mission-turned-fortress by 185 Texans against an overwhelming Mexican army in 1836.

25.name: Madame Butterfly
25.description: The story of a Japanese woman and the tragedy that ensues when she loves an American naval officer.

26.name: Nobleza gaucha
26.description: A licentious patron takes a beautiful stand to his palace in Buenos Aires, after abducting her. When the gaucho who wants to go to rescue her, the field owner uses a corrupt commissary to falsely accuse him of a thief.

27.name: The Warrens of Virginia
27.description: As the Civil War begins Ned Burton leaves his Southern love Agatha Warren and joins the Union army. He is later protected and saved from death by Agatha in spite of her loyalty to the South.

28.name: The Coward
28.description: Confederate soldier Frank Winslow is terrified of the war and eventually runs away from battle. But when he finds himself behind enemy lines with vital information, he must decide between ...                See full summary »

29.name: Hans hustrus förflutna
29.description: The international criminal Helene Voigt, who calls herself Countess Montigno, is on the run from the law.

30.name: The Despoiler
30.description: In war-torn Europe, Colonel Damien seizes an enemy town, then to persuade the defeated soldiers to give up their ill-gotten money, the Emir of Balkania, commander of the supporting native ...                See full summary »

31.name: Are You a Mason?
31.description: Frank Perry's wife Helen is away visiting her mother, and he uses this "free time" for a night of drinking at a nightclub. Unfortunately, when he tries to return home, he enters the wrong ...                See full summary »

32.name: Old Heidelberg
32.description: Karl Heinrich is the heir to the throne of the small European principality of Rutania, but he's a lonely child, not allowed to play with other children and knowing little about life outside...                See full summary »

33.name: Madame de Thèbes
33.description: King of the gypsies daughter Ayla give birth to a child with a man who does not belong to the tribe. She is cursed by his father and is expelled. A countess adopts the child.

35.name: The Girl of the Golden West
35.description: Road agent Ramerrez hides out in his girlfriend's store where the Sheriff knows him to be. The Sheriff plays The Girl a game of cards to decide Ramerrez's future. She wins. She later saves him from a hanging. She rides off with him.

36.name: Maciste
36.description: A young girl, pursued by a band of conspirators, hides in a movie theatre where she watches the film Cabiria. She determines to seek the aid of that film's strongman, Maciste. When she ...                See full summary »

37.name: Barnaby Rudge
37.description: A murderer's idiot son, jailed as an anti-Catholic rioter, is pardoned on the scaffold.

38.name: The Lamb
38.description: Gerald, the somewhat frail son of a wealthy New York family, is bested at the beach by Bill, a strapping young cowboy from Arizona. His fiancée Mary, ashamed of Gerald's "yellow streak", ...                See full summary »

40.name: Mästertjuven
40.description: Engineer Gordon has made a new invention for the military and a master thief get the mission to steal the blueprints.

42.name: Kreutzer Sonata
42.description: Miriam, a young Russian girl has an unfortunate love affair and is threatened with disgrace by having a child out of wedlock. Her father induces Gregor Randor, a young musician, to marry ...                See full summary »

43.name: The Devil's Daughter
43.description: When her lover deserts her, Gioconda Dianti seeks revenge by wrecking the lives of other men. When Lucio Settala, a famous sculptor, meets Gioconda and asks her to pose for him, she sets ...                See full summary »

45.name: The Whirl of Life
45.description: The plot is a loose autobiographical interpretation of the life of Vernon and Irene Castle, interspersed among a typical melodrama of the period

46.name: The Goddess
46.description: A young girl is reared on a desert island by natives and led to believe that she is a goddess. One day an outsider comes to the island, and persuades her to accompany him to preach about ...                See full summary »

47.name: The Captive
47.description: With her brother killed Sonya is given Turkish captive Mahmud to do the hard work on the farm. After they become fond of each other he strikes a Turkish officer. When peace arrives, his ...                See full summary »

48.name: The Clue
48.description: Russian brothers Count Boris and Alexis Rabourdin obtain a Japanese coastline defense map and plan to sell it to German agents in London. In America, Alexis schemes to marry wealthy Eve ...                See full summary »

49.name: När konstnärer älska
49.description: The famous painter Bernhard Steen has made a portrait of the actress Thora Flemming.

50.name: Life Without Soul
50.description: A young man gives life to a statue with disastrous results.
